Package onbon.y2.play

Y2 models for playing include the play list, the program, the standard areas, the audio, the bulletin and the dynamic area.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DynamicArea.Unit
    The unit displayed in the dynamic area.
    TextArea.Page
    The page displayed in the text area.
    TextualizeArea.Mask
    The page displayed in the text area.

    Class Description
    AnimationArea
    The animation area.
    AnimationEffect
    The animation effect.
    AnimationEffectDirectable
    The animation effect with direction.
    AnimationEffectFountain
    The animation effect of fountain.
    Area
    The abstract area provides common functions to configure a area.

    The border style.

    The audio area.
    AudioAreaFile
    The video area.

    The bulletin area.

    The date and time area.

    The page displays date, time and week inside the date and time area.

    The clock area.
    CountArea
    The count area.
    DateTimeArea
    The date and time area.

    The page displays date, time and week inside the date and time area.
    DateTimePattern
    The pattern of the date and time.
    DynamicArea
    The dynamic area.
    DynamicAreaTextUnit
    The text based page displayed in the dynamic area.
    DynamicPlan
    The dynamic plan includes a command and all resources used by the command.
    DynamicPlayFile
    The dynamic play file defines dynamic areas and how to play them on the screen.
    MarqueeArea
    The marquee area displays single line text.
    MarqueeAreaPage
    The page displays a single line text inside the marquee area.
    PicArea
    The picture area.
    PicAreaPage
    The page displays a picture in the picture area.
    ProgramFile
    The program file defines the areas to be played.
    ProgramPlayFile
    The program play file defines areas and how to play them on the screen.
    SensorTempArea
    The sensor area.
    TextArea
    The text area.
    TextAreaImagePage
    The page displays a image inside the text area.
    TextAreaTextPage
    The page displays text inside the text area.
    TextualizeArea
    The text area.
    TextualizeAreaImageMask
    The mask uses native image file.
    TextualizeAreaMaterial
    The material is used to renderer text to display.
    TextualizeAreaTextMask
    The mask uses text to create mask images.
    VideoArea
    The video area.
    VideoAreaPage
    The page plays a video inside the video area.

Package onbon.y2.play Description

Y2 models for playing include the play list, the program, the standard areas, the audio, the bulletin and the dynamic area.

Standard Areas:

  • AnimationArea
  • ChiCalendarArea - developing
  • ClockArea - developing
  • CountArea - developing
  • DateTimeArea
  • MarqueeArea
  • PicArea
  • SensorNoiseArea - developing
  • SensorTempArea - developing
  • SensorWindArea - developing
  • SensorAirQtyArea - developing
  • TextArea
  • ViedoArea
Special Areas:
  • AudioArea
  • BulletinArea
  • DynamicArea
